criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Harrim has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Harrim’s personal biases, one of Harrim’s resistances, or one of Harrim’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Harrim has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Harrim’s personal biases, one of Harrim’s resistances, or one of Harrim’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Harrim is susceptible to flattery when actually Harrim is resistant to flattery.
